name: Automatic Rewind
description:
Description --

you play as a time traveller armed with time-bombs trying to defeat time-bots with your broken time-machine. Luckily your shield, though frail, can provide some temporary cover from the time-bots' electric blasts.

------------------/

Controls 

wasd - move | space - place bomb 

------------------/

How to Play --

after a period of time, your time machine will activate. When active, the mines you have placed will activate, try to place them where the time-bots will have been.

- Good Luck!
